dcterms:description: This dataset provides spectral efficiency analysis of uplink-downlink decoupled access in C-V2X networks, focusing on performance indicators relevant to multi-connectivity scenarios.

dcterms:description: This dataset presents a framework for fully-decoupled radio access networks, focusing on resilient uplink base stations cooperative reception.
dcterms:title: Fully-Decoupled Radio Access Networks

dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on personalized wireless resource allocation in multi-connectivity B5G C-V2X networks, analyzing resource management strategies.
dcterms:title: Multi-Connectivity B5G C-V2X Networks

dcterms:description: This dataset addresses multi-connectivity management for 5G V2X communication, focusing on enhancing communication reliability and reducing latency.

dcterms:description: This dataset provides an overview of multi-connectivity as an enabler for reliable low latency communications, discussing its implications in various communication scenarios.
dcterms:title: Multi-Connectivity as an Enabler for Reliable Low Latency Communications

dcterms:description: This dataset explores the utilization of multi-connectivity to reduce latency and enhance availability for vehicle to infrastructure communication.

dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes the performance of uplink transmission in user-centric ultra-dense V2I networks, focusing on communication efficiency and reliability.

dcterms:description: This dataset presents a matching-based approach to multi-connectivity in multicellular, multiuser systems, focusing on optimizing resource allocation.
